description: This file defines an MqttManager class for managing MQTT communication within an Android application. It handles connecting, disconnecting, subscribing, unsubscribing, and publishing messages via the Eclipse Paho MQTT client, and logs relevant actions and events.

classes.name: MqttManager
classes.description: Class that manages MQTT connection, messaging, and logging within an Android context, providing an interface to publish, subscribe, and handle MQTT events.

methods.name: applyConfig
methods.description: Applies MQTT configuration parameters and stores them internally.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes an MQTT connection using the stored configuration, setting appropriate options and callbacks.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects and closes the current MQTT client connection.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to a specified topic with a given QoS level.

methods.name: publish
methods.description: Publishes a message with given payload, topic, QoS, and retention setting.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs a message with a timestamp and severity level, storing it in the internal logs list.
